医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
舞蹈帮助帕金森病患者协商他们的身份东芬兰大学和斯德哥尔摩 Balettakademien 最近的一项研究发现，在舞蹈团表演并参与其活动在帕金森病患者的身份和与疾病相关的身份协商中发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Dance-helps-people-with-Parkinsons-disease-negotiate-their-identity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Dance-helps-people-with-Parkinsons-disease-negotiate-their-identity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=413fcba2-dc48-4ffc-8e3b-6926273169bd Fri, 25 Aug 2023 15:32:20 -0400 Dance helps people with Parkinson's disease negotiate their identity
关于密歇根州医疗补助扩张影响的新报告显示了积极的影响和改进的机会在低收入美国人医疗补助医疗覆盖的关键时刻，一份关于密歇根州医疗补助扩张影响的报告显示了非常积极的影响，以及持续改进的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-report-on-the-impacts-of-Michigane28099s-Medicaid-expansion-shows-positive-effects-and-opportunities-for-improvement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-report-on-the-impacts-of-Michigane28099s-Medicaid-expansion-shows-positive-effects-and-opportunities-for-improvement.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ab1a0e0-25e5-4171-abad-7256cdb1bd7b Fri, 25 Aug 2023 15:23:00 -0400 New report on the impacts of Michigan’s Medicaid expansion shows positive effects and opportunities for improvement
处理速度影响 TBI 患者的记忆康复结果凯斯勒基金会的科学家报告了一项随机对照试验的结果，该试验检查了处理速度对凯斯勒基金会改进的故事记忆技术 (KF-mSMT) 对中度至重度创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 患者的治疗效果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Processing-speed-influences-memory-rehabilitation-outcomes-in-TBI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Processing-speed-influences-memory-rehabilitation-outcomes-in-TBI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2fd1eff-073b-4cba-8c89-6566b234f241 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 15:18:08 -0400 Processing speed influences memory rehabilitation outcomes in TBI patients
研究人员发现神经母细胞瘤的新治疗方法神经母细胞瘤是神经系统的肿瘤。它们可以在身体的许多地方形成，是幼儿癌症相关死亡的最常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Researchers-discover-new-therapeutic-approach-for-neuroblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Researchers-discover-new-therapeutic-approach-for-neuroblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b313c45-f65a-4b23-a0c3-f96e956d1413 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 15:11:53 -0400 Researchers discover new therapeutic approach for neuroblastoma
解开罗恩·德桑蒂斯关于一个不可能的堕胎生存故事的辩论轶事当本周第一次共和党总统初选辩论中提到堕胎话题时，佛罗里达州州长罗恩·德桑蒂斯分享了一件令人费解的轶事，讲述的是他遇到的一名妇女，他说这名妇女在堕胎手术中幸存下来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Untangling-Ron-Desantise28099-debate-anecdote-about-an-improbable-abortion-survival-story.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Untangling-Ron-Desantise28099-debate-anecdote-about-an-improbable-abortion-survival-story.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad93e0fd-6667-4e3f-867c-db067d0aafc7 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 15:11:16 -0400 Untangling Ron Desantis’ debate anecdote about an improbable abortion survival story
水质可能在囊性纤维化患者的 NTM 肺部感染中发挥作用美国国家过敏和传染病研究所（隶属于美国国立卫生研究院）的一项新研究表明，环境供水中某些矿物质和金属含量过高可能会增加囊性纤维化患者患非结核分枝杆菌 (NTM) 肺部感染的风险。健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Water-quality-may-play-a-role-in-NTM-pulmonary-infections-in-people-with-cystic-chemistry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Water-quality-may-play-a-role-in-NTM-pulmonary-infections-in-people-with-cystic-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13a3cf80-1c85-42c1-9580-18f4e848b863 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 15:03:33 -0400 Water quality may play a role in NTM pulmonary infections in people with cystic fibrosis
肯尼索州立大学教授获得美国国立卫生研究院资助，研究线虫的表观遗传肯尼索州立大学生物学教授布兰登·卡彭特因本科生的研究经历而受到启发，开始从事科学事业。最近，他获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的资助，将为他的学生提供类似的体验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Kennesaw-State-professor-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-epigenic-inheritance-in-nematodes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Kennesaw-State-professor-receives-NIH-grant-to-study-epigenic-inheritance-in-nematodes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34d61223-7120-4c56-9907-f44786043357 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 14:51:45 -0400 Kennesaw State professor receives NIH grant to study epigenetic inheritance in nematodes
新的 3D 模型模拟阿尔茨海默病中脑细胞和免疫细胞的相互作用当神经元开始死亡时，与阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 相关的认知能力下降就会发生，这可能是由于不适当的免疫反应以及由淀粉样蛋白沉积和 tau 蛋白缠结（该疾病的两个标志）引发的大脑过度炎症引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-3D-model-mimics-brain-cell-and-immune-cell-interactions-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-3D-model-mimics-brain-cell-and-immune-cell-interactions-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39fc3d37-4d60-4641-8e59-012e9f64a272 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 14:47:00 -0400 New 3D model mimics brain cell and immune cell interactions in Alzheimer's disease
研究表明并非所有肾上腺癌患者术后都需要米托坦肿瘤完全切除后，并非所有肾上腺皮质癌患者都需要之前的标准治疗米托坦。 Martin Fassnacht 教授和 Massimo Terzolo 教授在一项临床试验中证明了这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Study-shows-not-all-adrenal-carcinoma-病人-need-mitotane-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Study-shows-not-all-adrenal-carcinoma-病人-need-mitotane-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b33a6b14-d83c-47b4-9d47-1084d4ccb560 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 14:40:23 -0400 Study shows not all adrenal carcinoma patients need mitotane after surgery
ESC 心力衰竭指南的重点更新整合了最新的循证治疗欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 心力衰竭指南的重点更新内容今日在《欧洲心脏杂志》在线发表，该更新主要遵循了应改变心力衰竭患者治疗的重大新试验的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Focused-update-of-ESC-Heart-Failure-Guidelines-integrates-latest-evidence-based-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Focused-update-of-ESC-Heart-Failure-Guidelines-integrates-latest-evidence-based-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db8b88ea-af9d-4263-84d5-a1cd8b297076 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 14:17:20 -0400 Focused update of ESC Heart Failure Guidelines integrates latest evidence-based treatments
